thread.title: Kimi Raikkonen leads Barcelona Formula 1 testing for Ferrari

title: Kimi Raikkonen leads Barcelona Formula 1 testing for Ferrari
text:
Kimi Raikkonen leads Barcelona Formula 1 testing for Ferrari By Jamie Klein Tech Why Ferrari's 2017 ideas could be hard to copy Share this article on 
Kimi Raikkonen led the second day of Formula 1 pre-season testing at Barcelona, putting Ferrari just 0.023 seconds clear of Lewis Hamilton's Mercedes... Continue reading this story for free .
